title.rendered: On the occasion of Children’s Day, 104.8 Ishq FM and Smile Foundation joined hands to promote education for all through the ‘Ishq wala push’ initiative.

content.rendered: The initiative aimed at spreading awareness on the importance of education during the pandemic. At a time when it was difficult for children from under-priviledged backgrounds to have access to textbooks, mobile phones, laptops and stationary as classes shifted online, our campaign tried to reach out as many people as possible to seek support and donations. It was an attempt to reach 1,00,000 children across the country and bring them back into the fold of education.
